summary: The customer called to report an issue with their TV service after downgrading their plan with Contoso Wireless. The agent explained that the basic plan does not include access to the premium channels, which is why the customer was having issues. The customer expressed frustration at having to pay more money to upgrade back to the premium plan in order to access the same channels that were included in their previous plan. The agent apologized for any confusion and reiterated that the terms and conditions state that each plan has different levels of service and features associated with it.
